sections.purpose: To describe the standard operating procedure for general weighing of reagents and chemicals.
sections.scope: Applicable to all weighing tasks in Pharmaceutical Chemistry.
procedure: Check that the balance is level and the pan is clean.
Power ON the balance and allow it to initialize.
Place the weighing boat or paper on the pan and press 'TARE'.
Carefully add the substance to be weighed.
Record the weight once the reading has stabilized.
Remove the material and clean the balance pan with a soft brush.
Switch OFF the balance at the end of the working day.
precautions: Do not place chemicals directly onto the weighing pan.
Ensure the balance is used within its specified range.
Avoid weighing near sources of heat, moisture, or strong air currents.
Handle the balance with care; do not drop objects on the pan.
Calibrate the balance regularly as per the institutional schedule.
